game.title: Quests: Your Character's Past
game.description: You have a memory of past events that have changed your life, but you don't know which event will be the most important.

task.objective: Speak with the Mystic Seer in the Market Square
task.description: Find the Mystic Seer and ask about your past.
Ask the townsfolk about their memories of your character or any significant events they may have witnessed.
